info.name: üè• Pregnancy AI - Complete API Collection
info.description: Complete API documentation with 153 endpoints across 16 modules

request.description: Send OTP to email for verification
User login with email/patient_id and password

body.raw:
{
  "patient_id": "PAT_12345",
  "first_name": "Jane",
  "last_name": "Smith",
  "date_of_birth": "1990-05-15",
  "blood_type": "O+",
  "gender": "Female",
  "emergency_contact_name": "John Smith",
  "emergency_contact_phone": "1987654321",
  "emergency_contact_relationship": "Husband",
  "address": "123 Main St, Cityville, State 12345",
  "height": 165.0,
  "weight": 62.0,
  "is_pregnant": true,
  "last_period_date": "2024-01-15",
  "medical_conditions": [],
  "allergies": [],
  "current_medications": []
}

request.description: Verify if a JWT token is valid
Get user profile by patient ID
Get all appointments for authenticated patient with optional filters

body.raw:
{
  "appointment_date": "2025-10-20",
  "appointment_time": "10:00",
  "type": "Routine Checkup",
  "appointment_type": "Video Call",
  "notes": "First trimester checkup",
  "patient_notes": "Experiencing mild morning sickness",
  "doctor_id": "doctor123"
}

request.description: Get specific appointment details for authenticated patient
Update appointment details - ONLY for pending appointments (UpdateAppointmentSchema)

body.raw:
{
  "appointment_date": "2025-10-21",
  "appointment_time": "14:00",
  "type": "Follow-up",
  "appointment_type": "In-person",
  "appointment_status": "pending",
  "notes": "Rescheduled appointment",
  "patient_notes": "Need ultrasound results discussion",
  "doctor_notes": "Patient requested time change",
  "doctor_id": "doctor123"
}

request.description: Cancel/delete appointment - works for both pending and approved
Get upcoming appointments for authenticated patient
Get appointment history with filtering support
Get all appointments for doctor management

body.raw:
{
  "appointment_date": "2025-10-22",
  "appointment_time": "15:30",

  "appointment_type": "Video Call",
  "notes": "Urgent appointment for high-risk patient",
  "patient_notes": "Patient reports severe symptoms",
  "doctor_id": "doctor123"
}

request.description: Get specific appointment details for doctor
Update appointment - doctor can update all fields (UpdateAppointmentSchema)

body.raw:
{
  "appointment_date": "2025-10-23",
  "appointment_time": "09:00",
  "type": "Post-Surgery Follow-up",
  "appointment_type": "In-person",
  "appointment_status": "confirmed",
  "notes": "Post-op checkup required",
  "patient_notes": "Recovery progressing well",
  "doctor_notes": "Monitor surgical site",
  "doctor_id": "doctor456"
}

request.description: Delete appointment - doctor can delete appointments
Get all pending appointments for doctor approval
Get appointment statistics for doctor dashboard
Save medication log to patient profile (SaveMedicationLogSchema)

body.raw:
{
  "patient_id": "PAT_12345",
  "medication_name": "Prenatal Vitamins",
  "date_taken": "2025-10-16",
  "notes": "Take with food",
  "prescribed_by": "Dr. Smith",
  "medication_type": "vitamin",
  "side_effects": [],
  "is_prescription_mode": true,
  "prescription_details": "One tablet daily with meals",
  "dosages": [
    {
      "dosage": "1 tablet",
      "time": "09:00",
      "frequency": "Once daily"
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Get medication history for a patient
Get upcoming dosages and alerts for a patient
Get tablet tracking history for a patient
Upload prescription details and dosage information (UploadPrescriptionSchema)

body.raw:
{
  "patient_id": "PAT_12345",
  "medication_name": "Iron Supplements",
  "prescription_details": "Take 65mg elemental iron daily with vitamin C",
  "prescribed_by": "Dr. Johnson",
  "medication_type": "supplement",
  "dosage_instructions": "One tablet daily",
  "frequency": "Once daily",
  "duration": "3 months",
  "special_instructions": "Take with vitamin C for better absorption, avoid tea/coffee",
  "pregnancy_week": 20
}

request.description: Get prescription details and dosage information
Process prescription document using PaddleOCR (file upload)
Process prescription using PaddleOCR directly (file upload)

body.raw:
{
  "text": "Medication: Iron Supplement
Dosage: 65mg
Frequency: Once daily
Duration: 3 months
Special Instructions: Take with vitamin C",
  "patient_id": "PAT_12345"
}

request.description: Process prescription with N8N webhook directly

body.raw:
{
  "patient_id": "PAT_12345",
  "tablet_name": "Prenatal Vitamin",
  "tablet_taken_today": true,
  "is_prescribed": true,
  "notes": "Taken at 9 AM with breakfast",
  "date_taken": "2025-10-16",
  "time_taken": "09:00",
  "type": "vitamin",
  "timestamp": "2025-10-16T09:00:00Z"
}

request.description: Manually trigger medication reminders (no body required)
Test medication reminder email (no body required)
Test N8N webhook directly (no body required)
Upload and process medical documents (UploadMedicalLabSchema - file upload)

}

Get food history for a patient
Get early pregnancy symptoms for week

request.description: Ingest symptom knowledge from external source
Get doctor profile details from doctor_v2 collection
Get specific doctor profile by doctor_id
Get all doctors with optional filters (GetDoctorsSchema)
